member.name: M:Landis.Library.Parameters.InputValue_ExtensionMethods.CheckGreaterThanOrEqual``1(Landis.Utilities.InputValue{``0},``0,System.String)
member.summary: Check if an input value is > or = a minimum value.
member.returns: The actual input value if it > or = the minimum.
member.exception: Thrown if the value is < than the minimum.

member.name: M:Landis.Library.Parameters.InputValue_ExtensionMethods.CheckLessThanOrEqual``1(Landis.Utilities.InputValue{``0},``0,System.String)
member.summary: Check if an input value is < or = a maximum value.
member.returns: The actual input value if it < or = the maximum.
member.exception: Thrown if the value is > than the maximum.

member.name: M:Landis.Library.Parameters.InputValue_ExtensionMethods.CheckInRange``1(Landis.Utilities.InputValue{``0},``0,``0,System.String)
member.summary: Check if an input value is within a specified range.
member.returns: The actual input value if it is within range.
member.exception: Thrown if the value is outside the range.
